game.ai.shared.model

Class AbstractBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • game.ai.shared.model.AbstractBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoard, HasInvariant
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Connect4Board, TictactoeBoard

    public abstract class AbstractBoard
extends java.util.Observable
implements IBoard
    This abstract class will implement common methods shared for
    Both TictactoeBoard and Connect4Board extending from IBoard
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem
